objectives: Students will discuss food and dining out using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Business/Corporate themed scenarios related to food and dining out
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining food and dining out content with Business/Corporate narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore food and dining out through a Business/Corporate lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a corporate or business challenge involving food and dining out

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to food and dining out in a business context
Students engage in business themed role-play about food and dining out using neutral register
Students create original business themed content about food and dining out in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe food and dining out in a Business/Corporate scenario?
What strategy or negotiation might be involved in food and dining out?
Can you create a Business/Corporate story about food and dining out?
How does food and dining out change when viewed through a Business/Corporate perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this business scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Business/Corporate situation involving food and dining out
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in business context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within business theme

topic_genre_blend: food and dining out with strategy
food and dining out with negotiation
food and dining out with stakeholder

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Business/Corporate theme: Professional scenarios, workplace situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Business/Corporate themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
